scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd Develop &&" "cd server && npm run server" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd Develop && cd server && node server.js
scripts.server: cd Develop && cd server nodemon server.js --ignore client
scripts.build: cd Develop && cd client && npm run build
scripts.install: cd Develop && cd client && npm install
scripts.client: cd Develop && cd client && npm start
